game.name: Dungeon Apollonios
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This RPG tasks you with forming a party of up to seven members to search for and defeat the Demon King Bargon within a vast dungeon, ultimately reclaiming the Ring of Galtea. Movement occurs in real time, while combat shifts to a turn-based system.
